name: Spaceticles
description:
Deliver the Scriptures in your spaceship in this retro arcade platformer with 7 levels of difficulty and a new villain to overcome each level. Light all the houses in the dark and deliver the good news of Jesus Christ The Word Of God!

Use arrow keys to move and spacebar to fire

or use touch screen controls top of canvas left/right

bottom of canvas left to jump and right to fire

For downloaded game-

To play downloaded file simple open with internet browser on any device and if you see nothing enable JavaScript. Works offline and you can use the source code for your games! To edit open with any text editor.

Made with Marshmellow Cat.

https://succeedinglightssoftware.itch.io/marshmellow-cat-a-javascript-framework

enjoy !!
